alert.note: Alert for Custer; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southern Wheatland; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 1:18AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 or 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, and southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Expect slick roads and areas of poor visibility. Travel could be very difficult, including on I-94 and US-12. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy northwest winds will produce areas of blowing snow and wind chills of 25 to 35 below zero today. Snow will taper off by noon, but cold wind chills will persist through tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Allow extra time to reach your destination. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
